name: Vantec NexStar CX NST-300S2-BK Hard Drive Enclosure

reviews.name: Vantec NexStar CX 3.5" SATA to USB 2.0 External Hard Drive Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: Very good product and meets all expectations. The case is solid and very good construction. Installed HDD and installed instantly when connected to the computer. Recommend this HDD external case!
reviews.title: External Hard Drive Case better than expected.

reviews.name: Vantec NexStar CX 3.5" SATA to USB 2.0 External Hard Drive Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: Item was as described. Worked out of the box. Rather slow on large data transfer using USB 2.0. Copied 300 Gb of data to an installed WD 500 GB HDD and it took about 5 hours from a 2.5 GHz Processor dual core machine. Quite happy with the purchase however and with WM ship to store speed of delivery. Runs fairly cool.
reviews.title: Very nice value for the money

reviews.name: Vantec NexStar CX 3.5" SATA to USB 2.0 External Hard Drive Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: After my old computer died, I ordered this drive enclosure to recover some data still on the old hard drive. It only took a few moments to plug the drive into the enclosure and secure it with the supplied screws. Plugged in the USB cable and in no time I was accessing the information on the old drive. Easy to follow instructions and sleek style made this a great buy at the price.
reviews.title: 06 February 2013

reviews.name: Vantec NexStar CX 3.5" SATA to USB 2.0 External Hard Drive Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: What is to tell? Takes an AC adaptor - it's cheap - will pull data off drives at blazingly slow USB 2.0 speeds. If you need one - this cheap one is your answer. Don't try anything fast or fancy - it's a turtle but will get you to your data.
reviews.title: It's a drive enclosure

reviews.name: Vantec NexStar CX 3.5" SATA to USB 2.0 External Hard Drive Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: I'm only guessing at the exact rating values. I purchased this for someone else. They said it works. I guess that's good enough.
reviews.title: 30 October 2011
